name: Antiquarian
description: A dealer in ancient artifacts and curiosities; adventurers can sell recovered treasures, learn about historical items, or uncover cursed objects.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the musty scent of old books and ancient artifacts. Dust motes dance in the dim light that filters through grimy windows, while the air carries the weight of centuries. Strange objects line the shelves, each seeming to whisper secrets of forgotten times.
